SqlQueryStrings.SqlQueryString: SELECT X.User_Id,X.Username,X.First_Name,X.RoleId,Y.RoleName,X.Status AS Authenticated,X.AcceptanceStatus as Accepted FROM PM_Users X, PM_User_role Y WHERE X.UserName=@UserName AND X.Password=@Password AND X.RoleId=Y.RoleId AND X.Status=1

SELECT X.User_Id As 'User ID', X.Username as 'User Name',X.First_Name AS 'First name', X.Last_Name as 'Last Name', X.Designation as 'Designation',Y.RoleName as 'User Role', AcceptanceStatus as 'Acceptance' FROM PM_Users X, PM_User_role Y WHERE X.Status=@Status AND X.RoleId = Y.RoleId order by [AcceptanceStatus],[User_Id]
SELECT RoleId, RoleName FROM PM_User_role WHERE Status=@Status
UPDATE PM_Users SET status=0 WHERE User_Id in (@UserIdList)
UPDATE PM_Users SET AcceptanceStatus = 1, RoleId = @RoleId WHERE User_Id = @UserId
